subject: Basketball (College)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The revamping of the St. John’s basketball program hit a significant roadblock Thursday when three top recruits failed to qualify academically, leaving the team with just eight scholarship players to start the season.
snippet: The revamping of the St. John’s basketball program hit a significant roadblock Thursday when three top recruits failed to qualify academically, leaving the team with just eight scholarship players to start the season.
